if you're trying to encode to MP4 with AAC audio i'd recommend you check out Handbrake
ffmpeg and winff (a gui for ffmpeg) are in the repository - just use apt-get / apptitude / synaptic / ubuntu software center to install it/them
acetoneiso2 isn't in the ubuntu repository and thus you can't use the "apt-get install acetoneiso2" command
